name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sevierville @ Stadium Drive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hampton Inn did not disappoint in any way. I have come to depend on Hampton Inn for cleanliness, value, and eye appeal, and this was no exception. Staff was efficient, welcoming and extremely helpful.
reviews.title: Great as always

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: At the top of even Hampton's high standards, this hotel is great. I was especially impressed by the kindness and helpfulness of Eric, who handled my check-in. I will continue to use this hotel any time I'm in this area.
reviews.title: Great Hampton Inn!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: It is the consistency of excellence that is worth insuring a Hampton near your route/s. I've been through 20+ States and 2 Providence and they are all excellent, comfortable, great staff, well priced.
reviews.title: Still the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed at this location several times and have never been disappointed. Front desk staff is always friendly and accommodating and the gentleman who takes care of the breakfast room is diligent about keeping the buffet supplied with a great variety of foods.
reviews.title: One of the best Hampton Inns!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: On this stay we were in a spacious room on the 4th floor that overlooked the baseball field. Would have been a great view if a game was being played!
reviews.title: Can't Beat a Hampton Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed at this motel four times while traveling in the area. Our most recent stay was November 24-25-2012. Each time the staff have been very helpful, very courteous and professional. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The breakfast is very good. I recommend this Hampton Inn to anyone traveling in the area.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband is limited walking and we always request a room near the elevator. They are glad to accommadate his special needs.
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed at many hotels over the years, but this unit is outstanding! The front desk people took the time to recall our names and help us with eatery choices in the area. The breakfast was wonderful. The room was very quiet and clean. Couldn't have asked for a better experience.
reviews.title: Great Hampton Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stay in Hamptons often and get very good accomodations. This Hampton sets a higher bar with their level of customer service.
reviews.title: Good Choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: On our recent stay, we had to make reservations on short notice due to an unexpected change in plans. We arrived tired and weary after a long day. Frank at the front desk greeted us like long lost family. There were cookies, cheese and crackers waiting at the front. As we had not eaten since breakfast, this was a welcome sight.
reviews.title: And A Concert Too!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our Family Stayed here after Christmas and the Staff at the Hampton Inn on Stadium Drive made us feel welcome the entire 6 days we stayed here! Carl, who works in the lobby and Morning Dining area is truly a professional! Every Morning like clockwork he would have hot Breakfast ready for all the guests. One morning while eating breakfast we witnessed a family that showed up a few minutes late for Breakfast. Carl immediately went over to their table and made sure they got everything they wanted before he closed it down. I cannot tell you what a pleasure it was for us to talk to him every morning. Our children even looked forward to seeing him! Great employee the Hampton has working here! Front Desk Staff was also very courteous and didnt miss a beat when we had questions and met all of our needs. Even the House Keeping employees were great and friendly! Free coffee was provided all day long, plus Bannanas and Apples. At night, Carl would even put out Hot Chocolate for everyone to enjoy when coming back in from the Cold air. Wonderful Staff and Very Clean hotel!! Would highly recommend. Not a bad drive to Gatlinburg either from here and there is a Bass Pro Shops just down the road! Great Job to the management of this facility!
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Carl is the MAN!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Staff very courteous and price was excellent. Room was very large, as we were directly over the lobby. We had no disturbances to wake us through the night. The water at the hotel store was on the house, if you prefer bottled water versus tap. Will stay again and again.
reviews.title: Wonderful nights rest

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: I stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites back in June and just now getting to review it, but that just shows how memorable my stay was. The rooms were spottless as always , and of coarse very roomy. The desk staff was pleasurable, and proffessional. There is just one thing that absolutely made my stay! Carl, he is the breakfast attendant. Carl was a very unusual man, but he started my day off with a laugh and a great personality. Carl was overly friendly and just all together out there. I came down to breakfast, and noone else was down there so he pounced. I didn't get a minute of peace. He was just a great employee who genuinly loved his job.
reviews.title: Carl ha ha

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We made a quick trip to the Smoky Mountain and decided to stay at the Hampton Inn(based on trip advisor reviews) and we were not disappointed! Wonderful clean quiet room. Service was great at check in an check out! We will return!
reviews.title: Great stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: At Exit 417 you'll find a Hampton Inn (Dandridge, TN) that is very good. If you want to be another 10 miles closer to Knoxville, the Hampton Inn & Suites at Exit 407 is outstanding! New, clean, excellent, friendly staff. A must stay...
reviews.title: Another great find on I-40, just east of Knoxville, TN

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I just returned from a weekend in Pigeon Forge and I ca definitely say this Hampton Inn is by far the bestbone I've ever stayed in. The hotel was spotless and the staff was very friendly. We met Carl, the breakfast attendant this morning and he was great! I just can't say enough about the cleanliness of this hotel. I am very picky about hotels and I will never hesitate to stay at this one. Thanks to the staff for making our stay great!!
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here this weekend on our way home from AL. It is a very nice hotel. I am very picky about where I will stay, and would readily stay here again. It's very clean and the staff is very friendly and welcoming. We ate breakfast here, too, and it was good. The room was good sized and very comfortable and quiet.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: I stayed here on my way from Chicago to Charlotte. Friendly staff. Beautiful room. Quiet. Lovely breakfast. Easy to get to from the highway. I've stayed here several times now and have loved it every time.
reviews.title: Beautiful, clean, quiet room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided to stay at this hotel for a weekend getaway as it was close to one of the attractions we were visiting and would be out late at night. The hotel is very nice and clean, and the complementary breakfast is very good. Staff were nice and very friendly.
reviews.title: Weekend getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013
reviews.text: Only complaints we would have was the bed was pretty soft (I like a firm mattress) and the pillows were paper thin when you laid on them. Also, our room did not have a refrigerator, which was a little bit of a bummer keeping drinks cold (probably because they want you to buy at the on-site "store" they have in the lobby). We would definitely stay here again though.
reviews.title: Pleasurable experience in a very nice Hampton Inn and Suites

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Sevierville @ Stadium Drive Hotel
